content: pixie tales blanket pattern us terminology general info isn t the pattern pixie tales just simple adorable i believe you will love it as much as i do it s moderately easy fast and has such a nice & soft texture that makes a blanket nicely squishy the pattern will look gorgeous even using one solid color or you can use self striping yarn with long color changes like mandala sirdar color wheel sirdar snuggly pattercake or caron cakes etc as well as long gradient or ombre yarn using this pattern you can create any size square blanket or cushion cover wouldn t be a nice set the pattern is appropriate for the advanced beginning level crocheters for more experienced ones this would be a relaxing project the pattern includes the detailed descriptions a stitch guide video tutorial and pictures to demonstrate the final result i invite you to join crochet patterns by bebablanket facebook group where you can find the pictures of this pattern after each round stitches & abbreviations magic_ring magic_ring chain chain st stitch space space double_crochet double_crochet bpdc back post double_crochet fpdc front post double_crochet pop popcorn 5dc starting pop ch3 4dc into the same st or corner space please note that all popcorn stitches end with chain that closes popcorn this chain is not written separately in the pattern popcorn if you need more assistance to see how to crochet a popcorn please watch a video tutorial stitch guide video tutorial ♡ https //linktr ee/bebablanket ♡ 1 additional information beginning ch3 counts as a double_crochet except if it is a part of starting pop st at the end of the rounds ch1 1sc into the top chain of ch3 counts as ch2 corner space more information about perfect granny - practical solution dc3 = 1 double_crochet into the next three st the same applies to any number of double_crochet and other st 2dc = 2dc into the next one stitch the same applies to any number of double_crochet and other st yarn hook & approximate size the pixie tales pattern sample was created using the following yarn yarn mandala baby pixie hollow yarn weigh #3 yarn light weight/dk fiber 100 % acrylic hook size 4 mm sample size 32 3 in 82 cm square amount of yarn used for sample almost 3 skeins / 440 g / 1730 yds 1584 m you can use any yarn & matching size hook you like that suits your project let s start round 1 magic_ring starting pop pop7 into magic_ring tighten magic_ring slip_stitch into starting pop total 8 sts round 2 ch3 1dc into the first pop 1dc between two pops 2dc into the next pop ch2 2dc into the next pop 1dc between two pops 2dc into the next pop ch2 x 2 2dc into the next pop 1dc between two pops 2dc into the next pop ch1 1sc into the top chain of ch3 last corner space total 20 sts 4 ch2 corner space round 3
